actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee On Merchant Marine.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Executive Comment Requested from DOT, Fed Maritime Comm.

official_title: To amend the Shipping Act of 1984 to establish requirements for the approval by the Federal Maritime Commission of conference agreement amendments that terminate service to a port, to ensure consideration of the public interest with respect to those agreements and amendments, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Shipping Act of 1984 to require the approval of the Federal Maritime Commission before a conference agreement amendment that terminates service to a port may become effective. Provides for injunctive relief.

titles.title: To amend the Shipping Act of 1984 to establish requirements for the approval by the Federal Maritime Commission of conference agreement amendments that terminate service to a port, to ensure consideration of the public interest with respect to those agreements and amendments, and for other purposes.
